member.name: M:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProvider.SetConnectionMultiplexer(StackExchange.Redis.ConnectionMultiplexer)
member.summary: Set the to be used to connect to Redis.

member.name: M:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProvider.SetOptions(NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProviderOptions)
member.summary: Set the options to be used to configure each cache.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProviderOptions.Serializer
member.summary: Get or set the serializer used for serializing/deserializing values from Redis.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProviderOptions.OnException
member.summary: Get or set a handler for when exceptions occur during cache operations.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProviderOptions.LockValueFactory
member.summary: Get or set a factory used for creating the value of the locks. For example, this is helpful if you want to identify where the lock was created from (such as including the machine name, process id and a random Guid).

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.Redis.RedisCacheProviderOptions.Database
member.summary: Control which Redis database is used for the cache.
